summary: Bike management web app with a Create Bike form and a color-palette detection UI element (site header bar + bike-form palette).
known_issues: Create Bike shows 'action not available' and does not create a bike entry when submitting the form.

existing_features.title: Fix the Create Bike flow so that clicking the “Create Bike” submit button successfully creates a new bike entry and the new bike appears in the user’s bike list (Manage Bikes page) instead of showing an “action not available” error.

Remove the color-palette detection bar/UI element from the top of the website (global header/top-of-page area), while keeping the AI palette functionality inside the bike creation/edit form (BikeForm) unchanged and available.

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix Create Bike: button should submit the form and successfully create a new bike entry (resolve 'action not available').
Remove the color-palette detection bar from the top of the site, but keep the AI palette on the bike creation form.

projectName: Fix Create Bike submission and remove global palette bar (keep BikeForm palette)
